mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (email, pw, nm, tel, authCd, provider) VALUES (#{email}, #{pw}, #{nm}, #{tel}, #{authCd}, #{provider})
INSERT INTO t_user_follow ( iuserMe, iuserYou ) VALUES ( ${iuserMe}, ${iuserYou} )
mapper.select: SELECT B.iuser, B.nm, B.mainProfile , CASE WHEN C.iuserMe IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS isMeFollowYou FROM t_user_follow A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuserYou = B.iuser LEFT JOIN t_user_follow C ON C.iuserMe = ${iuserMe} -- 로그인한 사람 pk AND C.iuserYou = A.iuserYou WHERE A.iuserMe = ${iuserYou} -- 프로필 주인장 pk

SELECT B.iuser, B.nm, B.mainProfile , CASE WHEN C.iuserMe IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS isMeFollowYou FROM t_user_follow A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuserMe = B.iuser LEFT JOIN t_user_follow C ON C.iuserMe = ${iuserMe} AND C.iuserYou = A.iuserMe WHERE A.iuserYou = ${iuserYou}
mapper.delete: DELETE from t_user_follow WHERE iuserMe = ${iuserMe} AND iuserYou = ${iuserYou}
